programme.title: Band of Brothers
programme.desc: June 4, 1944: Uppottery, England. After high winds and poor visibility postpone the Allied invasion of Normandy, Lts Richard Winters and Lewis Nixon reflect on the events that led them to the brink of D-Day.

programme.title: Band of Brothers
programme.desc: It is two years earlier: in Camp Toccoa, GA, volunteers train for America's new military experiment, the paratroops. Theirs is one of nine companies in the 506th Parachute Infantry Regiment: E, aka Easy Company, commanded by the domineering Lt. Herbert Sobel. Through a regimen that involves frequent six-mile climbs up and down Currahee, a local mountain, Sobel succeeds in drilling the men into an elite unit. But his heavy-handed tactics, punishments for petty or imagined infractions, and strategic failures during manoeuvres, alienate Sobel from his men, who prefer his cool-headed second-in-command, Lt. Winters. After the 506th is shipped to England to complete training, Sobel harasses Winters by citing him for failing to inspect a latrine on time. When Winters requests a trial by court-martial, six of his sergeants: Salty Harris, Chuck Grant, Bill Guarnere, Carwood Lipton, Mike Ranney and Floyd Talbert request transfer rather than follow Sobel into combat.

programme.title: Band of Brothers
programme.desc: Scattered Easy members run into Pt Albert Blithe and head to a village to regroup.

programme.title: Band of Brothers
programme.desc: In England, Easy's D-Day veterans heal their bodies and minds and get acquainted with "green" replacements.

programme.title: Band of Brothers
programme.desc: Winters leads a contingent on a risky mission over a Dutch dike that results in a 'turkey shoot' of fleeing Germans.

programme.title: Band of Brothers
programme.desc: In the dead of winter, in the forest outside of Bastogne, Belgium, the men of Easy Company struggle to hold the line alone while fending off frostbite and hunger.

programme.title: Band of Brothers
programme.desc: Having thwarted the Germans at Bastogne, the exhausted Easy Company must now take the nearby town of Foy from the enemy.

programme.title: Band of Brothers
programme.desc: Easy Company arrives in the Alsatian town of Haguenau near the German border, and is ordered to send a patrol across the river to take enemy prisoners.

programme.title: Band of Brothers
programme.desc: Easy Company finally enters Germany to surprisingly little resistance, and has a chance to relax for the first time in months.

programme.title: Band of Brothers
programme.desc: Winters leads Easy Company into the Bavarian town of Berchtesgaden, he receives orders to take the abandoned 'Eagle's Nest', Hitler's breathtaking mountaintop fortress.

programme.title: The Pacific
programme.desc: The attack on Pearl Harbor leads Robert Leckie and John Basilone into combat, while Eugene Sledge says goodbye to pal Sid Phillips.

programme.title: The Pacific
programme.desc: The 1st and 7th Marines endure jungle hardships and a Japanese barrage in an attempt to retake a lost airfield in Guadalcanal.

programme.title: The Pacific
programme.desc: On leave in Melbourne, Leckie finds romance, while Basilone receives a Medal of Honour.

programme.title: The Pacific
programme.desc: As Sledge trains for combat in the US, Leckie and the 1st Marines combat the enemy and the elements in the jungles of New Britain.

programme.title: The Pacific
programme.desc: While Basilone reluctantly plays the war hero at home, Sledge gets his first taste of combat on the island of Peleliu.

programme.title: The Pacific
programme.desc: Sledge and Leckie battle oppressive heat and lack of water as the 1st Marines continue their assault on the Peleliu airfield.

programme.title: The Pacific
programme.desc: The Marines secure their objective at the Battle of Peleliu, though not without great cost. Sledge veers to the edge of moral collapse.

programme.title: The Pacific
programme.desc: Basilone returns to Camp Pendleton, where he courts fellow Marine Lena Riggi before shipping out to Iwo Jima.

programme.title: The Pacific
programme.desc: Sledge and the 1st Marines relieve an embattled Army division in Okinawa, straining bodies and minds.

programme.title: The Pacific
programme.desc: Leckie and Sledge adjust to life after war; Lena pays an emotional visit to Basilone's hometown.

programme.title: Generation Kill
programme.desc: The true story of the highly trained Marines of First Recon Battalion during the first 40 days of the Iraq war, detailing their experiences on the front line.

programme.title: Generation Kill
programme.desc: Along with the rest of First Marine Division, Bravo busts north towards Nasiriyah, where their sister company Alpha gets its first taste of combat.

programme.title: Generation Kill
programme.desc: Having survived its first trial by fire, Bravo scopes out a roadside hamlet but the company watches in horror and disbelief as a regimental combat team arrives with guns firing and obliterates the hamlet.

programme.title: Generation Kill
programme.desc: Alpha is asked to recover the body of a captured Marine who was murdered in Ah Shatra. Their mission takes a twist when a CIA-trained army of Iraqi Freedom Fighters arrives and then just as quickly departs.

programme.title: Generation Kill
programme.desc: The men of Bravo are frustrated by the capricious nature of the war and the actions of the higher-ups are getting harder to defend.

programme.title: Generation Kill
programme.desc: Captain America is over eager in his attempts to subdue a prisoner, while his men's growing disillusionment with his command is growing more apparent.

programme.title: Generation Kill
programme.desc: Bravo reaches Baghdad and is shocked by the sheer size and scope of the city. They set up shop in an abandoned cigarette factory with a chance to rest for a bit.

programme.title: The Replacement Killers
programme.desc: International superstar Chow Yun-Fat makes his Hollywood debut with Oscar (R) winner Mira Sorvino in THE REPLACEMENT KILLERS, a fierce and explosive action thriller from director Antoine Fuqua. After he betrays Mr Wei, the ruthless crime boss who hired him to avenge his son's death, professional killer John Lee (chow Yun-Fat) goes on the run. Enlisting the aid of beautiful document forger Meg Coburn (Mira Sorvino), Lee attempts to return to his family in China before they are victimised by his betrayal. But Wei's army of "replacement killers" is hot on his trail, and now both he and Meg are targets of their impressive firepower. With both sides fully armed and determined to fight to the death, an ultra-violent shootout breaks out when they finally face off against each other.

programme.desc: This is the critically acclaimed epic of the queen's turbulent and treacherous rise to power. Before the Golden Age, Elizabeth was a passionate and naive girl who came to reign over a land divided by bloody turmoil. Amid palace intrigue and attempted assassinations, the queen is forced to become a cunning strategist while weighing the counsel of her mysterious advisors, thwarting her devious rivals and denying her own desires for the good of her country.

A mere six years and 500 million friends later, Mark Zuckerberg is the youngest billionaire in history, but for this entrepreneur, success leads to both personal and legal complications.

programme.title: Hanna
programme.desc: Hanna is a teenage girl. Uniquely, she has the strength, the stamina, and the smarts of a soldier; these come from being raised by her father, an ex-CIA man, in the wilds of Finland. Living a life unlike any other teenager, her upbringing and training have been one and the same, all geared to making her the perfect assassin. The turning point in her adolescence is a sharp one; sent into the world by her father on a mission, Hanna journeys stealthily across Europe while eluding agents dispatched after her by a ruthless intelligence operative with secrets of her own. As she nears her ultimate target, Hanna faces startling revelations about her existence and unexpected questions about her humanity.

programme.desc: Corporate salesman Steve Butler (Damon) has been dispatched to the rural town of McKinley with his sales partner (Frances McDormand) to offer much-needed relief to the economically hard-hit residents in exchange for drilling rights to their properties. What seems like an easy job for the duo quickly becomes complicated by a respected schoolteacher (Hal Holbrook), a slick environmental activist (Krasinski), and Steve's interest in a local woman (Rosemarie DeWitt). As they grapple with a surprising array of both open hearts and closed doors, the outsiders soon discover the strength of an American small town at a crossroads.

programme.title: Men in Black 3
programme.desc: Agents J and K are back...in time. J has seen some inexplicable things in his 15 years with the Men in Black, but nothing, not even aliens, perplexes him as much as his wry, reticent partner. But when K's life and the fate of the planet are put at stake, Agent J will have to travel back in time to put things right. J discovers that there are secrets to the universe that K never told him, secrets that will reveal themselves as he teams up with the young Agent K to save his partner, the agency and the future of humankind.

programme.title: Jarhead: Law Of Return
programme.desc: Major Ronan Jackson, an accomplished fighter pilot for the Israel Defense Forces and son of a U.S. Senator, is shot down while flying through Syrian airspace. After miraculously surviving the crash, Jackson is taken captive by a group of Hezbollah militiamen. A gripping and powerful story packed with hard-hitting action, "Jarhead: Law of Return" follows a squad of elite soldiers, led by Sergeant Dave Flores, as they risk their own lives in the hopes of saving an ally they've never met.

programme.title: Machete
programme.desc: Left for dead after clashing with notorious Mexican drug kingpin Torrez, Machete has escaped to Texas, looking to disappear and forget his tragic past. What he finds is a web of corruption and deceit that leaves a bullet in a senator and Machete a wanted man. Machete sets out to clear his name and expose a deep conspiracy. But standing in his way are a ruthless businessman with an endless payroll of killers, a twisted border vigilante leading a small army, and a beautiful Immigration officer torn between enforcing the law and doing what is right.

programme.title: Scream
programme.desc: After a series of mysterious deaths befalls their small town, an offbeat group of friends led by Sidney Prescott become the target of a masked killer. As the body count begins to risine, Sidney her friends find themselves contemplating the "Rules" of horror films as they find themselves living in a real-life one.

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: The re-resurrected mummy of an Egyptian high priest kidnaps the son of archaeologists who first dug him up, and sets out to destroy mankind by commanding the army of the ancient Scorpion King.

programme.title: 300: Rise of an Empire
programme.desc: Greek general Themistokles of Athens leads the naval charge against invading Persian forces led by mortal-turned-god Xerxes and Artemisia, vengeful commander of the Persian navy.

programme.title: The Shallows
programme.desc: When a surfer is attacked by a great white shark 20 yards from shore, her short journey back to safety becomes the ultimate contest of wills.

programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: Before Blade's mother gave birth to him, she was bitten by a vampire, which made Blade immune to vampires. Now a vampire hunter, Blade, joined by vampire detective Hannibal King and Dracula-descendent Frank Drake, slay vampires.

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: Suffering from amnesia, Bourne has left his violent past behind and is living a normal life with Marie. His plans for a peaceful life are crushed when he narrowly escapes an assassination attempt.

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: Fuelled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his new-found ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
programme.desc: Blamed for the terrorist bombing of the Kremlin, IMF operative Ethan Hunt (Tom Cruise) is disavowed along with the rest of the agency when the President initiates 'Ghost Protocol'. Left without any resources or backup, Ethan must find a way to clear his agency's name and prevent another attack. To complicate matters further, Ethan is forced to embark on this mission with a team of fellow IMF fugitives whose personal motives he does not fully know.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A Harvard professor implicated in a murder must unravel an ancient code to expose the greatest conspiracy in history.

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
programme.desc: Humans come to realise that their new war against the Autobots could end with their own extinction when a threat more powerful than anything they have ever imagined presents itself.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: A young boy learns that he has extraordinary powers and is not of this Earth. As a young man, he journeys to discover where he came from and what he was sent here to do. But the hero in him must emerge if he is to save the world from annihilation and become the symbol of hope for all mankind.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: A young boy learns that he has extraordinary powers and is not of this Earth. As a young man, he journeys to discover where he came from and what he was sent here to do. But the hero in him must emerge if he is to save the world from annihilation and become the symbol of hope for all mankind.

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: Roland and the Man in Black share an ancient vendetta: they must fight to the death in an epic battle over the fate of the universe. The last Gunslinger, Roland Deschain has been locked in an eternal battle with Walter O'Dim, also known as the Man in Black, determined to prevent him from toppling the Dark Tower, which holds the universe together. With the fate of the worlds at stake, good and evil will collide in the ultimate battle as only Roland can defend the Tower from the Man in Black.

programme.title: Escape Room
programme.desc: A psychological thriller about six strangers who find themselves in circumstances beyond their control and must use their wits to find clues or die.

programme.title: Kick-Ass 2
programme.desc: Self-made superhero Kick-Ass and sweet-faced, foul-mouthed assassin Hit Girl try to return to life as 'normal' teenagers, but soon they are faced with their deadliest challenge yet. To seek revenge for his father's death, Red Mist has re-invented himself as the leader of an evil league of super-villains. To defeat their new nemesis, Kick-Ass and Hit Girl must team up with a new wave of masked crusaders, led by the badass Colonel Stars and Stripes, in this battle of real-life villains and heroes.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: After a radioactive spider bite, a nerdy teen develops keen senses and amazing strength.

programme.title: The Dark Knight
programme.desc: A rising criminal mastermind known as The Joker thrusts Gotham into anarchy and forces Batman closer to crossing the fine line between hero and vigilante.

programme.title: Godzilla: King of the Monsters
programme.desc: An epic action adventure that pits Godzilla against some of the most popular monsters in pop culture history. The new story follows the heroic efforts of the crypto-zoological agency Monarch as its members face off against a battery of god-sized monsters, including the mighty Godzilla, who collides with Mothra, Rodan, and his ultimate nemesis, the three-headed King Ghidorah. When these ancient super-species thought to be mere myths rise again, they all vie for supremacy, leaving humanity's very existence hanging in the balance.

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Former CIA assassin Jason Bourne resurfaces just as his former employers are implementing a new program aimed at hunting him down. Now fully recovered from his amnesia, Bourne teams up with Nicky Parsons to uncover the truth behind his father's death, while simultaneously exacting revenge and evading the government forces hot on his trail.

programme.title: The Last Samurai
programme.desc: Set in Japan during the 1870s, this film tells the story of Capt Nathan Algren, a respected American military officer hired by the Emperor of Japan to train the country's first army in the art of modern warfare. The Emperor plans to wipe out the ancient Imperial Samurai warriors for more Westernised ways, but Algren finds himself unexpectedly affected and influenced by his contact with the Samurai, which places him at the centre of a struggle between two worlds, with only his own sense of honour and justice to guide him.

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: When Langdon discovers evidence of the resurgence of an ancient secret brotherhood known as the Illuminati, he also faces a deadly threat to the existence of the secret organisation's most despised enemy: the Catholic Church. When he learns that the clock is ticking on an unstoppable Illuminati time bomb, he jets to Rome where he joins forces with beautiful Italian scientist Vittoria Vetra and together they follow a 400-year-old trail of ancient symbols that mark the Vatican's only hope for survival.

programme.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
programme.desc: Humans are at war with the Transformers, and Optimus Prime is gone. The key to saving the future lies buried in the secrets of the past and the hidden history of Transformers on Earth. Now, it's up to the unlikely alliance of Cade Yeager, Bumblebee, an English lord and an Oxford professor to save the world.

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: After a catastrophic car crash, a young woman wakes up in an underground bunker with a man who claims to have saved her for an apocalyptic attack.

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: After a catastrophic car crash, a young woman wakes up in an underground bunker with a man who claims to have saved her for an apocalyptic attack.

programme.title: Bad Boys 2
programme.desc: Burnett and Lowrey reunite as out-of-control, trash-talking cops. Bullets fly, cars crash, and laughs explode as they pursue a whacked-out drug lord from the streets of Miami to the barrios of Cuba.

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: After they are attacked by members of a satanic cult, a couple moves house, only to discover that an evil entity has come with them, attaching itself to a vintage doll called Annabelle.

programme.title: Annabelle: Creation
programme.desc: Several years after the tragic death of their little girl, a dollmaker and his wife welcome a nun and several girls from a shuttered orphanage into their home, soon becoming the target of the dollmaker's possessed creation: Annabelle.

programme.title: Smokin' Aces
programme.desc: After snitching mob secrets to the FBI, a $1 million contract is put out on Buddy 'Aces' Israel. Now, everybody wants him dead.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: A talented young getaway driver relies on the beat of his personal soundtrack to be the best in the game. When he meets the girl of his dreams, Baby sees a chance to ditch his criminal life and make a clean getaway. But after being coerced into working for a crime boss, he must face the music when a doomed heist threatens his life, love and freedom.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
programme.desc: On a dangerous assignment to recover stolen plutonium, Ethan Hunt chooses to save his team over completing the mission, allowing nuclear weapons to fall into the hands of a deadly network of highly-skilled operatives intent on destroying civilization. Now, with the world at risk, Ethan and his IMF team are forced to become reluctant partners with a hard-hitting CIA agent as they race against time to stop the nuclear fallout. There's never been a threat more destructive, stunts so jaw-dropping in the film critics are calling the best "Mission" yet!

programme.title: Elysium
programme.desc: In the year 2154, two classes of people exist: the very wealthy, who live on a pristine man-made space station called Elysium, and the rest, who live on an overpopulated, ruined Earth. The people of Earth are desperate to escape the planet's crime and poverty, and they critically need the state-of-the-art medical care available on Elysium - but some in Elysium will stop at nothing to enforce anti-immigration laws and preserve their citizens' luxurious lifestyle. The only man with the chance bring equality to these worlds is Max, an ordinary guy in desperate need to get to Elysium. With his life hanging in the balance, he reluctantly takes on a dangerous mission - one that pits him against Elysium's Secretary Delacourt and her hard-line forces - but if he succeeds, he could save not only his own life, but millions of people on Earth as well.

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: Pulled from the sea with two bullets in his back, Jason Bourne discovers he has the skills of a very dangerous man and no memory of his violent past. Racing to unlock the secret of his own identity, he discovers the deadly truth: he's an elite government agent. To the government, Jason Bourne isn't just their property: he's a malfunctioning $30 million weapon. Lethally trained, built to disappear, he's an agent on the run who has to be taken out. Now, the government's top operative has become its No.1 target.

programme.title: Venom
programme.desc: Eddie Brock is a broken man after he loses everything including his job and fiancee. Just when his life is at its lowest, he becomes host to an alien symbiote which results in extraordinary superpowers - transforming him into Venom. Will these powers be enough for this new lethal protector to defeat great evil forces, especially against the far stronger and more weaponized symbiote rival, Riot?

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: In search of his next big story, Eddie lands an exclusive interview with convicted murderer and death row inmate Cletus Kasady,

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: For the love of a beautiful woman a city will burn to the ground. An epic tale of honour, war, forbidden passion and the towering Trojan Horse.
This film is a ferocious retelling of the ancient Battle of Thermopylae, depicting the titanic clash in which King Leonidas and 300 Spartans fought Xerxes and his massive Persian army to the death.
This film is a ferocious retelling of the ancient Battle of Thermopylae, depicting the titanic clash in which King Leonidas and 300 Spartans fought Xerxes and his massive Persian army to the death.

programme.title: Dragonheart: Vengeance
programme.desc: Lukas, a young farmer whose family is killed by savage raiders in the countryside, sets out on an epic quest for revenge, forming an unlikely trio with a majestic dragon and a swashbuckling, sword-fighting mercenary, Darius. Helena Bonham Carter voices Siveth, the ice breathing dragon who was once banished from the kingdom for failing to save the king's life. Compelled by the young man's cause, she emerges from hiding, using her fantastical powers on the trio's adventurous journey which brings revelations and rewards beyond vengeance. Dragonheart: Vengeance is an exciting action-adventure filled with fantasy and humor that will thrill the entire family.

programme.title: The Conjuring
programme.desc: Before there was Amityville, there was Harrisville. This film tells the true story of Ed and Lorraine Warren, world-renowned paranormal investigators, who were called to help a family terrorised by a dark presence in a secluded farmhouse. Forced to confront a powerful demonic entity, the Warrens find themselves caught in the most horrifying case of their lives.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: A new blade runner, LAPD Officer K, unearths a long-buried secret that leads him on a quest to find Rick Deckard, who's been missing for 30 years.

programme.title: Wonder Woman 1984
programme.desc: In the vibrant, sleek 1980s, Wonder Woman will have to muster all her strength, wisdom and courage as she finds herself squaring off against Maxwell Lord and the Cheetah.

programme.title: Bad Boys For Life
programme.desc: The original Bad Boys are back! After a string of assassinations and an attempt on Mike's life, he convinces a hesitant Marcus to hold off retirement and partner one last time.

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: For the love of a beautiful woman a city will burn to the ground. An epic tale of honour, war, forbidden passion and the towering Trojan Horse.

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: The world's hunger for extreme sports and reality competitions has grown into reality TV bloodlust. Now, the most extreme racing competition has emerged and its contestants are murderous prisoners. The rules of the Death Race are simple: win five events and you're set free. Lose and you're road kill splashed across the Internet.

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: A deep-sea submersible part of an international undersea observation program has been attacked by a massive creature, previously thought to be extinct, and now lies disabled at the bottom of the deepest trench in the Pacific with its crew trapped inside. With time running out, expert deep sea rescue diver Jonas Taylor is recruited by a visionary Chinese oceanographer, against the wishes of his daughter Suyin, to save the crew and the ocean itself from this unstoppable threat: a pre-historic 75-foot-long shark known as the Megalodon. What no one could have imagined is that, years before, Taylor had encountered this same terrifying creature. Now, teamed with Suyin, he must confront his fears and risk his own life to save everyone trapped below bringing him face to face once more with the greatest and largest predator of all time.

programme.title: U-571
programme.desc: This is the story of a US Navy captain and his crew. They are just beginning to enjoy 48 hours of leave when they receive word to immediately return to duty. On a top-secret assignment, they must disguise themselves as Nazis and infiltrate a severely damaged Nazi U-boat. Once on board, they are to steal the Nazi's top-secret decoding device and sink the sub before the Germans catch on to what's really happening. Their mission is more dangerous and frightening than anything they could have ever imagined, but one which has the power to turn the tide of battle.

programme.title: Death Race 4: Beyond Anarchy
programme.desc: Danny Trejo returns as the ruthless bookie, Goldberg, in the wildest, bloodiest, Death Race ever. After a failed attack on inmate and legendary driver, Frankenstein, Black Ops specialist Connor Gibson (Zach McGowan) infiltrates a super-maximum federal prison with one goal - enter the immoral and illegal Death Race and take Frankenstein down. Connor enlists the help of Baltimore Bob (Danny Glover) and Lists (Fred Koehler), and unexpectedly falls in love with bartending beauty Jane (Christine Marzano). Connor will have to fight for more than his life in this brutal world of no guards, no rules, no track, and no fear.

programme.title: Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw
programme.desc: Hobbs and Shaw, the trash-talking sworn enemies, must team up to take down a cyber-genetically enhanced anarchist with a bio weapon that threatens the fate of humanity.

programme.title: Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw
programme.desc: Hobbs and Shaw, the trash-talking sworn enemies, must team up to take down a cyber-genetically enhanced anarchist with a bio weapon that threatens the fate of humanity.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A military cop becomes involved in a deadly game of cat-and-mouse when five people are randomly murdered by a sniper.

programme.title: The Conjuring 2: The Enfield Poltergeist
programme.desc: The supernatural demonologists must travel to London to help a single mother and her four children when their house is plagued by malicious spirits.

programme.title: Wonder Woman (2017)
programme.desc: Before she was Wonder Woman, she was Diana, princess of the Amazons, trained to be an unconquerable warrior. Raised on a sheltered island paradise, when an American pilot crashes on their shores and tells of a massive conflict raging in the outside world, Diana leaves her home, convinced she can stop the threat. Fighting alongside man in a war to end all wars, Diana will discover her full powers and her true destiny.

programme.title: Interstellar
programme.desc: As life on Earth grinds to a halt, a team of explorers and astronauts travel through a wormhole and across the galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: The Shallows
programme.desc: When a surfer is attacked by a great white shark 20 yards from shore, her short journey back to safety becomes the ultimate contest of wills.

programme.title: Death Race 4: Beyond Anarchy
programme.desc: Danny Trejo returns as the ruthless bookie, Goldberg, in the wildest, bloodiest, Death Race ever. After a failed attack on inmate and legendary driver, Frankenstein, Black Ops specialist Connor Gibson (Zach McGowan) infiltrates a super-maximum federal prison with one goal - enter the immoral and illegal Death Race and take Frankenstein down. Connor enlists the help of Baltimore Bob (Danny Glover) and Lists (Fred Koehler), and unexpectedly falls in love with bartending beauty Jane (Christine Marzano). Connor will have to fight for more than his life in this brutal world of no guards, no rules, no track, and no fear.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (2014)
programme.desc: Based on the hit '90s animation, the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles are back and have teamed up with news reporter April O'Neill to save New York City from the evil Shredder.

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: Roland and the Man in Black share an ancient vendetta: they must fight to the death in an epic battle over the fate of the universe. The last Gunslinger, Roland Deschain has been locked in an eternal battle with Walter O'Dim, also known as the Man in Black, determined to prevent him from toppling the Dark Tower, which holds the universe together. With the fate of the worlds at stake, good and evil will collide in the ultimate battle as only Roland can defend the Tower from the Man in Black.

programme.title: Machete
programme.desc: Left for dead after clashing with notorious Mexican drug kingpin Torrez, Machete has escaped to Texas, looking to disappear and forget his tragic past. What he finds is a web of corruption and deceit that leaves a bullet in a senator and Machete a wanted man. Machete sets out to clear his name and expose a deep conspiracy. But standing in his way are a ruthless businessman with an endless payroll of killers, a twisted border vigilante leading a small army, and a beautiful Immigration officer torn between enforcing the law and doing what is right.

programme.title: 2 Guns
programme.desc: When an attempt to take down a drug cartel blows up in their faces, two undercover operatives are forced to go on the run together, though neither knows that the other is a federal agent. Suddenly, everyone on both sides of the law wants them dead, and their only hope is to trust each other.

programme.title: Doom
programme.desc: A frantic call for help from a remote research station on Mars sends a team of mercenary Marines into action.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: In this sly satire, a group of elites gather to hunt ordinary Americans for sport. But one of The Hunted fights back against The Hunters' leader.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Two Miami cops must find $100 million in stolen heroin before their department is shut down. With time running out, detectives Burnett and Lowrey track a master thief into the Miami underworld, dodging bullets and bad guys along the way. A sexy witness can identify the suspect, but a mix-up causes her to believe Burnett is Lowrey, forcing the partners to switch identities. Now, between shoot-outs and car chases, married man Burnett has to stick close to their only witness, while playboy Lowrey goes home to his partner's wife and kids to learn the joys of parenthood - the hard way.

programme.title: In Love and War
programme.desc: This romantic drama is largely based on writer, Ernest Hemingway's real experience in World War I as a young soldier. When Hemingway (Chris O'Donnell), at the age of 18 goes into WWI battle, his leg is severely wounded during a shelling attack in Italy, and is sent to a military hospital. There he falls in love with his nurse Agnes von Kurowsky (Sandra Bullock). His 26-year-old nurse who comforts him through his difficult recuperation. He wants to continue the love affair after his recovery but to no avail. Later Hemingway, writes about her in novels and short stories.

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: In the brand new adventure Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle, the tables are turned as four teenagers are sucked into the world of Jumanji. When four high-school kids discover an old video game console with a game they've never heard of Jumanji they are immediately drawn into the game's jungle setting, literally becoming the avatars they chose: gamer Spencer becomes a brawny adventurer; football jock Fridge loses (in his words) 'the top two feet of his body' and becomes an Einstein; popular girl Bethany becomes a middle-aged male professor; and wallflower Martha becomes a badass warrior. What they discover is that you don't just play Jumanji you must survive it. To beat the game and return to the real world, they'll have to go on the most dangerous adventure of their lives, discover what Alan Parrish left 20 years ago, and change the way they think about themselves or they'll be stuck in the game forever.

programme.desc: When a boy is sent to Coral Key to stay with his salty uncle for the summer, he never dreamed he would become best mates with a feisty, orphaned dolphin named Flipper.

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: When Troll Village is invaded by the Bergens, two mismatched trolls must try and tolerate each other as they set out on a journey to rescue their friends.

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: In the brand new adventure Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle, the tables are turned as four teenagers are sucked into the world of Jumanji. When four high-school kids discover an old video game console with a game they've never heard of Jumanji they are immediately drawn into the game's jungle setting, literally becoming the avatars they chose: gamer Spencer becomes a brawny adventurer; football jock Fridge loses (in his words) 'the top two feet of his body' and becomes an Einstein; popular girl Bethany becomes a middle-aged male professor; and wallflower Martha becomes a badass warrior. What they discover is that you don't just play Jumanji you must survive it. To beat the game and return to the real world, they'll have to go on the most dangerous adventure of their lives, discover what Alan Parrish left 20 years ago, and change the way they think about themselves or they'll be stuck in the game forever.

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Gru welcomes a new member to the family, Gru Jr, who's intent on tormenting his dad. However, their peaceful existence soon comes crashing down, when criminal mastermind Maxime Le Mal escapes from prison.

programme.title: Oink
programme.desc: A nine-year-old girl gets a pig named Oink as a gift from her grandfather.

programme.title: Hey Arnold! The Movie
programme.desc: The 'hood' and 'The Man' go head-to-head when Arnold and the gang try to save their tight-knit community from the bulldozer.

programme.title: An American Girl: Chrissa Stands Strong
programme.desc: In this family drama, Chrissa Maxwell moves to Minnesota where she faces bullying at her new school from the 'mean girls'. When Chrissa makes it into the swimming team, the taunting goes too far.

programme.title: Stuart Little 3: Call of the Wild
programme.desc: School's out for the summer, and the Little family is spending their vacation at a beautiful lakeside cabin. Stuart can't wait to spend his entire vacation canoeing, hiking and finding his inner scout.

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin
programme.desc: In this beloved tale, Tintin and Snowy travel the world outwitting their enemies to find the resting place of The Unicorn, a shipwreck that holds the key to a vast fortune and an ancient curse.

programme.title: Dr. Seuss' the Lorax
programme.desc: Dr Seuss' The Lorax is an adaptation of Dr Seuss' classic tale of a forest creature who shares the enduring power of hope. In the walled city of Thneed-Ville, where everything is artificial and even the air is a commodity, a boy named Ted hopes to win the heart of his dream girl, Audrey. When he learns of her wish to see a real tree, Ted seeks out the Once-ler, a ruined old businessman outside of town in a stark wasteland. Upon hearing of how the hermit gave into his greed for profits and devastated the land over the protests of the Lorax, Ted is inspired to undo the disaster. However, the greedy Mayor of Thneed-Ville, Aloysius O'Hare, has made his fortune exploiting the environmental collapse and is determined to stop the boy from undermining his business.

programme.title: The Karate Kid (2010)
programme.desc: Dre, a young boy, finds himself bullied by Cheng, a rebellious kung fu prodigy at his school. However, things change after he befriends Mr Han, a maintenance man, who happens to be a kung fu expert.

programme.desc: Brooklyn teen Miles Morales is introduced to the limitless possibilities of the Spider-Verse, where more than one can wear the mask.

Turbo
programme.desc: A snail that has forever dreamed of the ability to move fast is granted his wish after a freak accident. Now he's out to win the Indy 500.

programme.title: Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Recruited from youngsters into the global spy game, four penguins are called into action by a mysterious espionage organisation in order to save the world from a villainous octopus.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: As kids in the 1980s, Sam Brenner, Will Cooper, Ludlow Lamonsoff, and Eddie 'The Fire Blaster' Plant saved the world thousands of times - at 25 cents a game in the video arcades. Now, they're going to have to do it for real. When intergalactic aliens discover video feeds of classic arcade games and misinterpret them as a declaration of war, they attack the Earth, using the video games as the models for their assaults, and now, US President Cooper must call on his old-school arcade friends to save the world from being destroyed by PAC-MAN, Donkey Kong, Galaga, Centipede, and Space Invaders. Joining them is Lt Col Violet Van Patten, a specialist supplying the arcaders with unique weapons to fight the aliens.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit, the mischievous and adventurous hero who has captivated generations of readers, now takes on the starring role of his own cute, contemporary comedy with attitude. In the film, Peter's feud with Mr McGregor escalates to greater heights than ever before as they rival for the affections of the warm-hearted animal lover who lives next door.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Pets
programme.desc: Taking place in a Manhattan apartment building, Max's life as a favourite pet is turned upside down, when his owner brings home a sloppy mongrel named Duke. They have to put their quarrels behind when they find out that an adorable white bunny named Snowball is building an army of lost pets determined to take revenge.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Pets 2
programme.desc: Terrier Max is coping with some major life changes. His owner is now married and has a toddler, Liam. Max is so worried about protecting the boy that he develops a nervous tic. On a family trip to a farm, Max and mutt Duke encounter canine-intolerant cows, hostile foxes and a terrifying turkey, all of which only elevates Max's anxiety. Luckily, Max gets some guidance from veteran farm dog Rooster, who pushes Max to ditch his neuroses, find his inner alpha and give Liam a little more freedom.

programme.title: Bee Movie
programme.desc: A bee is abuzz over a scandal: people are stealing honey to eat. With the help of a florist, he sues the human race for 'honey laundering'.

programme.title: Detective Pikachu
programme.desc: The world of Pokemon comes to life! The story begins when ace detective Harry Goodman goes mysteriously missing, prompting his 21-year-old son Tim to find out what happened. Aiding in the investigation is Harry's former Pokemon partner, Detective Pikachu: a hilariously wise-cracking, adorable super-sleuth who is a puzzlement even to himself. Finding that they are uniquely equipped to communicate with one another, Tim and Pikachu join forces on a thrilling adventure to unravel the tangled mystery. Chasing clues together through the neon-lit streets of Ryme City - a sprawling, modern metropolis where humans and Pokemon live side by side in a hyper-realistic live-action world - they encounter a diverse cast of Pokemon characters and uncover a shocking plot that could destroy this peaceful co-existence and threaten the whole Pokemon universe.

programme.title: Imagine That
programme.desc: Evan Danielson finds it difficult to connect with his seven-year-old daughter, Olivia. Evan is too distracted by his career demands to understand the value of quality father-daughter time, and Olivia has all but given up on her father. When the promotion of a lifetime is suddenly within his reach, Evan finds himself torn between his parental responsibilities and staving off his company rival, the annoyingly pseudo-mystical Johnny Whitefeather. Evan has always been a man in complete control, but when he really starts to lose it, Olivia steps in with her own bit of advice: winning stock tips courtesy of the princesses and queen who she visits through her security blanket, her 'Goo-Gaa'.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Once upon a Christmas Eve, an orphan baby crawled into Santa's bag of gifts and was taken to the North Pole. Raised by Papa Elf, Buddy comes to realise he doesn't fit in with the other elves. Determined to find a place where he belongs, Buddy searches for his real dad in New York City. In the Big Apple, Buddy finds out why his dad is on the naughty list. But most importantly, he sees that the world is seriously lacking in Christmas spirit, which causes Santa all kinds of problems. So with the help of a beautiful department store elf, Buddy tries to teach his dad and the world the true meaning of Christmas spirit and to prove to everyone that Santa really exists.

programme.desc: Lenny has relocated his family back to the small town where he and his friends grew up. This time around, the grown ups are the ones learning lessons from their kids on a day notoriously full of surprises: the last day of school.

programme.title: Tag
programme.desc: For one month every year, five highly competitive friends hit the ground running in a no-holds-barred game of tag they've been playing since the first grade, risking their necks, their jobs and their relationships to take each other down with the battle cry: "You're It!" This year, the game coincides with the wedding of their only undefeated player, which should finally make him an easy target. But he knows they're coming and he's ready.

programme.title: Bad Neighbours 2
programme.desc: Mac and Kelly decide to sell and move to the suburbs. But when a sorority moves in and threatens the sale, they must team up with their former enemy Teddy, to bring the girls down.

programme.title: Dolittle
programme.desc: After losing his wife seven years earlier, the eccentric Dr. John Dolittle, famed doctor and veterinarian of Queen Victoria's England, hermits himself away behind the high walls of Dolittle Manor with only his menagerie of exotic animals for company. But when the young queen falls gravely ill, a reluctant Dolittle is forced to set sail on an epic adventure to a mythical island in search of a cure, regaining his wit and courage as he crosses old adversaries and discovers wondrous creatures.

programme.title: Step Brothers
programme.desc: Two woefully immature men are forced to live as brothers when their parents decide to get hitched.

programme.title: Fun With Dick And Jane (2005)
programme.desc: A couple who lose their minds whilst trying to hold onto the elusive American dream, turn to crime to get back in the black and outwit a greedy, corporate executive.

programme.title: Jack and Jill
programme.desc: Jack Sadelste is a successful advertising executive in LA with a gorgeous wife and kids, who dreads one event each year; the arrival of his identical twin sister Jill. Jill's neediness and passive-aggressive behaviour is maddening to Jack, turning his normally tranquil life upside down. Jack's circumstances spin more out of control when Jill decides to stay and he doesn't believe she'll ever leave.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: Beca, Fat Amy and the Barden Bellas are back to pitch slap the world! After a scandal threatens to derail their last year at Barden, the three-time defending champs worry that they've lost their harmony for good. With one chance left at redeeming their legacy, they must they must face off against the toughest competition on the planet: German supergroup Das Sound Machine and fight for their right to win at the World Championships of A Cappella. It will take the power of sisterhood to find their voice and see what it takes to be the world's top pitches!

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: A fast talking con-artist Rayford Gibson and conservative bank teller Claude Banks are accidently teamed up to become the funniest odd couple east of the Mississippi. In an effort to pay off Ray's debt and restore Claude's reputation, they travel south on a bootlegging run for some quick cash. There is no limit to their comical misfortune as they are placed at the scene of a crime and their mistaken identity lands them right in the front of the judge. The hysterical comedy gives a whole new meaning to friends for life.

programme.title: The 40 Year Old Virgin
programme.desc: Andy Stitzer has gone 40 years without a woman and his pals are out to break his luck. Can he survive their hilariously bad advice? Will he find love and get laid?

programme.title: American Pie: The Wedding
programme.desc: Stifler takes centre stage in the funniest - and grossest - sequel. Jim finally proposes to Michelle, but nothing goes smoothly in this finale which will keep die-hard Pie eaters coming back.

programme.desc: The third and final instalment in the comedy smash hit. This time, there's no wedding. No bachelor party. What could go wrong, right? But when the Wolfpack hits the road, all bets are off.

But their dull existence is interrupted by several grisly and suspicious accidents, and the crime-fighting duo turn up the heat and hand out high-octane, car-chasing, gun-fighting, big-city justice.

Now, after not seeing each other for years, Todd's world comes crashing down on the eve of his wedding when an uninvited Donny suddenly shows up. Trying desperately to reconnect with his son, Donny is now forced to deal with the repercussions of his bad parenting skills.

programme.title: Father Figures
programme.desc: After discovering their father didn't die when they were young, two brothers set off to find him. They end up learning more about their mother than they ever wanted to know.

programme.desc: The accidental secret agent returns, sent on a mission to stop a group of international assassins before they eliminate a Chinese leader and cause global chaos.
